Class Rules

  • java.lang.Object
    • Rules
  • public class Rules
extends java.lang.Object
    The Rule class represents all of the rules of the othello game. It holds a field object.
    Version:
    0.0
    Author:
    MohammadaliKeshtparvar

      • ruleOfGame

        public void ruleOfGame​(Piece piece)
        In this method we add new piece and change type of pieces that are between the input location and the piece that has same type.
        Parameters:
        piece - the piece that with user input is made.

      • othelloGame

        public void othelloGame()
        the othelloGame method is the main method in this project. It use another method and keep on until the number of pieces that their type is 3 equal by zero for one player and two player.
